song_name: Always Sunny - I Like Paddy's Pub
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Always Sunny - I Like Paddy's Pub is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Always Sunny - I Like Paddy's Pub is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
